items.summary: Update the Scan & Print tab two-step serial workflow so it is explicitly optimized for barcode-scanner-only input: (1) autofocus the 1st Serial Number input on entry/reset, (2) after a valid 1st scan play the success sound, show a green success border on the 1st input, and move focus to the 2nd input, (3) after a valid 2nd scan play the success sound, show a green success border on the 2nd input, and immediately proceed to auto-print.

Fix the auto-print step in the Scan & Print tab so that after a valid 2nd scan the app actually sends the generated CPCL payload to the connected printer transport via the existing printer service (CPCL protocol), rather than only logging/recording history.
